product_name: Snow Peak Titanium Double Wall 450 Mug
long_description: The Snow Peak Titanium Double Wall 450 Mug is insulated to keep your coffee or tea warm nearly all day. It's also built to withstand your adventures without adding lots of weight to your pack. Corrosion-resistant titanium is extremely lightweight and it leaves no metallic smell or taste; mug weighs only 4.2 oz. and holds 14 fl. oz. Can be used with a Snow Peak plastic lid (not included) to add extra insulation. Folding handles make the mug easily packable. Double-wall construction is not suitable for cooking; do not place the Snow Peak Double Wall 450 Mug on an open flame or hot burner.
short_description: The Snow Peak Titanium Double Wall 450 Mug is insulated to keep your coffee or tea warm nearly all day. It's also built to withstand your adventures without adding lots of weight to your pack.
